title: Search Advertising Portfolio
description: Search Advertising Portfolio Class includes fields that defines Portfolio.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Portfolio Billing State
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Portfolio Billing State indicates whether client should be billed for spend from this Portfolio.

meta:enum.Managed: Client will be billed for the spend from this portfolio
meta:enum.Not Managed: Client will not be billed for the spend from this portfolio

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Portfolio Group ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Set of portfolios can be assigned to a portfolio Group. This identifier indicates if portfolio is assigned to a portfolio group.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Portfolio Group Name
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Indicates Name of the Portfolio Group if portfolio belongs to a Portfolio Group.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Creation Time of the Campaign in Adobe Platform
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Creation Time in UTC when Campaign got created in Adobe Platform.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Modified Time of the Campaign in Adobe Platform
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Modified Time in UTC when Campaign got modified in Adobe Platform.
